home.title: HoloCure – Save the Fans!
home.description: HoloCure – Save the Fans! A free fan-made roguelike featuring Hololive VTubers. Play, upgrade, and survive endless waves of enemies. Join the fun now!

list.question: Why is HoloCure free?
list.answer: HoloCure is a fan-made project created out of love for Hololive VTubers and the community surrounding them. The game is entirely free to play with no ads or microtransactions, allowing fans to enjoy it without any barriers.

list.question: Who made HoloCure?
list.answer: HoloCure was developed by Kay Yu, an independent animator and developer passionate about Hololive. The game takes inspiration from popular titles like Vampire Survivors and Magic Survival to craft a unique experience.

list.question: How many playable characters are in HoloCure?
list.answer: As of the latest update, HoloCure features 47 playable characters, each with their own unique abilities and skills. These characters represent multiple Hololive generations and branches, offering diverse playstyles.

list.question: What is the best character in HoloCure?
list.answer: The best character in HoloCure depends entirely on your playstyle and preferences. Since every character has unique skills and weapons, experimenting with different characters is essential to find your favorite.

list.question: What language is HoloCure written in?
list.answer: HoloCure is written in GameMaker Studio, a versatile and widely-used game development engine. This choice allows for smooth performance and efficient development of the game.

list.question: What language does HoloCure support?
list.answer: HoloCure currently supports English and Japanese for its interface and gameplay. The developers may add support for additional languages in future updates.

list.question: Is HoloCure multiplayer?
list.answer: No, HoloCure is currently a single-player game that focuses on individual experiences. There is no multiplayer or co-op mode available at this time.

list.question: How do I unlock new characters in HoloCure?
list.answer: You can unlock new characters through the in-game gacha system using coins earned during gameplay. The more you play, the more opportunities you have to expand your roster of characters.

list.question: Can I stream HoloCure gameplay?
list.answer: Absolutely! Streaming HoloCure is encouraged, and many Hololive VTubers and fans already share their gameplay on platforms like YouTube and Twitch. It's a great way to engage with the community.

list.question: Is HoloCure available on Mac?
list.answer: Currently, HoloCure is designed for Windows PC only, and no official Mac version has been confirmed. However, some players may use third-party tools to run it on Mac at their own risk.

list.question: Does HoloCure have achievements?
list.answer: Yes, HoloCure features in-game achievements that add extra challenges and rewards for players. They allow you to track your progress and enjoy additional goals beyond regular gameplay.

list.question: What are the system requirements for HoloCure?
list.answer: HoloCure requires a Windows PC with at least 4GB of RAM and a dual-core processor. It is a lightweight game and demands minimal storage space, making it accessible to most PCs.

privacyPolicy.1-p: HoloCure operates the website https://holocure.fun and is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy outlines how we handle information when you use our online game.
privacyPolicy.2-p-1: We do not collect any personal identification information from users. Our service is designed to be used without requiring personal data.
privacyPolicy.2-p-3: We collect non-personal data through web cookies, including usage statistics and preferences, to improve our service and user experience. This may include your display settings and customization preferences.
privacyPolicy.3-p: Any collected non-personal data is used solely to enhance the functionality of our game and improve user experience. We do not share any data with third parties.
privacyPolicy.6-p: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@holocure.fun.
